name: Affinity Template
summary: Learn about .AFTEMPLATE files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Affinity Photo, Affinity Publisher, and Affinity Designer are vector and raster graphic applications similar to Adobe Photoshop, Adobe InDesign, and Adobe Illustrator. When you are creating a new document, such as an .AFPHOTO, .AFPUB, or .AFDESIGN file, you can start with a template to save you time.

The applications come with AFTEMPLATE files, but you can also create custom templates. To create an AFTEMPLATE file with Serif Affinity Photo, Affinity Designer, or Affinity Publisher, select File → Export as Template.

description: An AFTEMPLATE file is a template created by Serif Affinity Photo, Serif Affinity Publisher, and Serif Affinity Designer applications. It stores a document, which may include one or more pages or artboards, layers, images, text, shapes, strokes, and other elements. Affinity users create AFTEMPLATE files to store documents with content and settings they want to replicate in other Affinity documents.

instructions: You can open an AFTEMPLATE file with Serif Affinity Photo, Serif Affinity Designer, or Serif Affinity Publisher by selecting File → Open.

images.caption: AFTEMPLATE file open in Serif Affinity Photo 2
